problem_text_cn: 如图,小兰用彩纸制作了一个圆锥形的生日帽．若底面半径为5cm,母线长为10cm,不考虑接缝的情况,则这个圆锥的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the picture, Xiaolan made a cone-shaped birthday hat with colored paper. If the radius of the bottom surface is N_0 and the length of the bus bar is N_1, regardless of the seam, the lateral area of the cone is ()
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆锥的计算,解答本题的关键是熟记圆锥的侧面积公式,及每个字母所代表的含义,难度一般．
